item.title: Amy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hayao Miyazaki
item.description: "We depict hatred, but it is to depict that there are more important things. We depict a curse, to depict the joy of liberation. " -- Hayao Miyazaki

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hayao Miyazaki
item.description: "I'm not going to make movies that tell children, "You should despair and run away"." -- Hayao Miyazaki

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hayao Miyazaki
item.description: "I think 2-D animation disappeared from Disney because they made so many uninteresting films. They became very conservative in the way they created them. It's too bad. I thought 2-D and 3-D could coexist happily." -- Hayao Miyazaki

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Fiction is the truth inside the lie." -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I'm having a magenta day. Not just red, but magenta!" -- Stephen King

item.title: Amy add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Amy add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Amy add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Amy add a quote by John August
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, Is cherished by the wisest men." -- John August
